TANGO EN FLOR
Springtime Festivalito
May 10-12, 2024
Podgorica, Montenegro
Register
Event by
Venue
Tango en Flor will take place at the iconic Hard Rock Cafe Podgorica, located in the very heart of the city. All milongas and workshops will be held in the upper level of HRC, a beautiful private area overlooking the main city square.

Couples

Their love for tango will inspire our embraces. Their presence will make our dance floor come alive. We're thrilled to introduce these three exceptional couples, all eager to share their tango with us.
Relja Dereta
& Anđela Djiki Ristić
(Serbia)
Osky Casas
& Magdalena Vračarić
(Argentina/Croatia)
Emir Ljaljević
& Andrea Drljević
(Montenegro)

Mood makers

We've carefully handpicked our DJs to ensure an unending flow of irresistible golden-age melodies that will effortlessly keep you tied to the dance floor. The Hard Rock Cafe vibe is in the place!
DJ Osky Casas
(Argentina)
DJ Andjela Djiki Ristić
(Serbia)
DJ Davor Perhaj
(Croatia)
DJ Luka Radunović
(Montenegro)
DJ Boban Šćepanović
(Montenegro)

Mood catchers

With their keen eye, our mood catchers will turn every smile, dance, and embrace into lasting memories.
Maja Đukanović
Luka Maraš

by



The dancing won't stop after the weekend. Join us for the AFTERPARTY BY BUENA VISTA on Monday evening at Ethno Jazz Club Sejdefa.
The entrance fee is charged separately.
